org.sat4j.tools.counting.SamplingSet

  • Packages that use SamplingSet 
    Package Description
    org.sat4j.tools.counting
    Implementation of several model counters.

    • Uses of SamplingSet in org.sat4j.tools.counting

      Classes in org.sat4j.tools.counting that implement SamplingSet 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AllVariablesSamplingSet
      The AllVariablesSamplingSet considers as sampling set all the variables of the formula.
      class  SamplingSetAdapter
      The SamplingSetAdapter adapts an IVecInt to a SamplingSet.
      Fields in org.sat4j.tools.counting declared as SamplingSet 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected SamplingSet AbstractApproxMC.samplingSet
      The set of variables to consider when creating parity constraints.
